page.title: 02Events in Bognor Regis
page.content: The {Clown Convention }takes place at the Regis Centre every April.There are lots of tricks that the clowns perform.You may even see{Bingo's}wig fringe go up an down.The clowns stroll through the town and you can also join in with them. {Bingo}who is the clown that started this convention is really called Trevor Pharo.They have lots of other things you can take part in like,competitions,prizes,games, dressing up and lots,lots more.They all last for a week. The Bognor Regis{Carnival}takes place in July every year. There is a theme every year for the decoration of floats.Lots of clubs take part.All the traffic is stopped by policemen.Judges give marks for all the floats.The carnival has two carnival princesses and one carnival queen.The floats form a procession through the town.
